subject: Diving (Sports Event)
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: British synchronized diver Tom Daley, who is smaller than more than half the women competing in his events, can control himself in the air better than divers with larger body masses.
snippet: British synchronized diver Tom Daley, who is smaller than more than half the women competing in his events, can control himself in the air better than divers with larger body masses.
